game.title: The Mysterious Thief
game.objective: Find the thief who stole the emerald statue from the museum.
game.description: You have been hired by the museum curator to find the thief who stole an emerald statue from the museum. The thief is known to be a master of disguises and has left no clues behind. Follow the leads you receive to track down the thief and recover the stolen treasure.

task.objective: Talk to the museum guard to learn more about the theft.
task.description: The museum guard may have some useful information about the thief's identity or whereabouts. Speak to him in the museum lobby.

task.objective: Follow the lead to the Thieves' Hideout.
task.description: The museum guard mentioned a rumor about a thieves' hideout in the city. Investigate this lead to find clues about the thief's whereabouts.

task.objective: Confront the thief and recover the stolen emerald statue.
task.description: You have finally tracked down the thief to his hideout. Confront him and retrieve the stolen emerald statue.
